_header: Sir king of arms I thou pray
_description: Two couplets on scrolls in a drawing prefixed to Johannis Dade’s De arte Heraldica

BodLauMis733.Transcription:
Sir king of armys I þou prayTenduce me in armys to saySone
                    for þat in armys diffusenes isI counceil you attende to þis
                    tretis
BodLauMis733.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus Codices Laudiani.
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1858: 521.
